column8: the police in Sen Sok district were carrying out traffic stops on road 1986
column10: Khan Sen Sok. They tried to stop a Range Rover
column12: driven by a man intoxicated along Highway 1986
column13: but the man did not stop the vehicle. Authorities caught up with the cra about 1km away on Street 1019/ the corner of Mong Rithy Road.------The source added that after the incident
